title: Diamond Vine Bangle - Kangan
materials: G Color). Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: A delicate and modern take on the traditional bangle. Features a vine-like design accentuated with clusters of sparkling diamonds. The openwork structure allows for comfortable wear and a subtle sparkle.
occasions: or as a subtle statement piece at festive occasions such as Sankranthi or Ugadi.
description: This beautifully crafted bangle seamlessly blends modern design with timeless elegance. Its lightweight design and comfortable fit make it ideal for daily wear. The high-quality diamonds and Hyderabadi polish ensure lasting beauty and value. A delightful gift for yourself or a loved one.
